info.name: KepleroAI API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for KepleroAI - AI Chatbot Management Platform

## Getting Started
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Set up environment variables (or use collection variables)
3. Run the Login endpoint to authenticate
4. The access token will be automatically saved for subsequent requests

## Base URL
Local Development: http://localhost:5001/api/v1

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. The collection is configured to use bearer token authentication automatically.

formdata.description: Supported: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, CSV

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Summer Sale Campaign",

  "scheduledAt": "2025-12-01T10:00:00Z",
  "message": "Check out our summer sale!"
}
